English.Text: "It-it cannot be...!" An officer's hand quavers towards the apparition, but the faceless woman mirrors him, pointing her claw-fingered as if to single him out. At this, everybody dashes for the entrance screaming, trampling and shoving one another. Finding the portcullis in the courtyard mysteriously returned to the raised position, your spooked crew take this chance to make a run for it. The portcullis falls. None but that marked man is crushed under its weight.
